rules.title: Confirm eligibility and destination acceptance
rules.detail: Private → Official is not supported. Official → Private is conditional on the destination private server accepting transfers. Destination must be available (not maintenance, not offline, not weekly-active limit).

rules.title: Back up your base(s)
rules.detail: Use the Base Reconstruction Tool (Hagga Basin only). Verify backup succeeds: sub-fief console must be on a foundation, and all buildables must be inside sub-fief limits. Tool stores up to 3 bases.

rules.title: Back up your vehicles
rules.detail: Use the Vehicle Backup Tool. If a vehicle can’t be stored normally, remove inventory or relocate it, or disassemble with a Welding Torch and store parts.

rules.title: Store valuables in inventory or bank
rules.detail: Inventory, bank contents and Solari transfer.

rules.title: Be in Hagga Basin
rules.detail: Transfer can only start from Hagga Basin.

rules.title: Confirm transfer token and cooldown
rules.detail: Account starts with 1 token, max hold is 1. Token replenishes after 7 days. Any additional transfer, including moving back, costs another token.

rules.title: Read the confirmation screen and complete text entry
rules.detail: The game shows key limitations and items that may be lost. You must acknowledge limitations and perform manual text entry to proceed.

rules.title: Do not disconnect during transfer
rules.detail: Exiting the flow or closing the session cancels the transfer. While a character is 'In Transfer', you cannot initiate other transfers on the account.

rules.title: Post-transfer validation plan
rules.detail: After success you spawn at Griffin’s Reach (Hagga Basin). Validate inventory, bank, Solari, and backups in BRT and VBT.
